translation.en: Hello?
-[man 1] Turn him over. -[man 2] Is he alive?
[woman] Can you hear me?
Hey.
Hey. Where are you? I've been calling for an hour.
translation.zh: ‎你在哪里？我都打了一个小时电话了

translation.en: Lorna, you're not my wife anymore.
translation.zh: ‎劳娜 你现在已经不是我妻子了

translation.en: Thanks for that, Mick,
I still get confused. Some days, I think I am your wife.
translation.zh:
‎我还是很混乱
‎有时候觉得自己是你妻子

translation.en: Others, I'm more like your mother.
translation.zh: ‎其余的时候 我更像是你妈

translation.en: Don't do that. Think I can't tell when you're holding the phone away?
translation.zh:
‎别耍花招
‎你以为我听不出来你把手机拿远了？

translation.en: What I am is a person who runs this practice,
what's left of it anyway,
and as such, I need to be able to reach you.
Okay, you reached me. What's the problem?
translation.zh: ‎好吧 你联系上我了 有什么事情？

translation.en: [Lorna] We got a call from Judge Holder.
translation.zh: ‎霍尔德法官给我们打了个电话

translation.en: -She wants to meet with you ASAP. -The Chief Judge?
translation.zh:
‎-她想尽快见你一面
‎-首席法官？

translation.en: Technically, the presiding judge. Tell me you're not sleeping with her.
translation.zh:
‎严格地说是审判长
‎别告诉我你跟她有一腿

translation.en: No. Why would you even say that?
translation.zh: ‎没有 你怎么会说出这种话？

translation.en: The only reason you'd be called to the private chambers of a female judge
translation.zh:
‎你被传唤到
‎女法官私人办公室的唯一原因

translation.en: is, A, you have a case before her, or B, you have a personal relationship.
translation.zh:
‎要么是你有一件案子在她手上
‎要么就是你们之间有私事

translation.en: And since you haven't had any cases for a year…
translation.zh: ‎既然你一年都没接任何案子了…

translation.en: I never even met the woman.
-She wants to meet with you now. -But she didn't say what it was about?
translation.zh:
‎-她现在想见你
‎-可她没说是什么事吗？

translation.en: No. But can we please allow for the possibility
translation.zh: ‎没说 但我们能不能对这件事

translation.en: this might be positive?
Maybe she wants to assign you a case pro bono.
translation.zh: ‎也许她想指派一件公益案件给你

translation.en: -Work begets work. -Well, maybe.
translation.zh:
‎-这能带来更多的工作机会
‎-也许吧

translation.en: Mick?
Still here.
Drive one of the Lincolns.
They're in storage.
Get one out of storage. The Lincoln becomes you.
translation.zh:
‎那就解封一辆
‎那林肯车就是你的门面

translation.en: And you become you.
Should this present as a real opportunity, you gotta go in there full Mickey Haller.
translation.zh:
‎这要是个真正的机会
‎你米奇哈勒要全力以赴

translation.en: All right.
Hey!
Hey.
You've got Hayley tonight. Just calling to remind.
translation.zh: ‎今晚你接海莉 我就是提醒你一下

translation.en: 'Cause you think I'll forget?
Six o'clock, okay? Not 6:10. Not 6:05.
translation.zh:
‎6点整 明白吗？
‎不是6点10 不是6点05

translation.en: Who's the lucky guy? Do I know him?
translation.zh:
‎谁这么幸运今晚约到了你？
‎是我认识的人吗？

translation.en: 6:00 p.m. sharp, Mickey.
[Mickey] I got it.
Hey, what can you tell me about Judge Mary Holder?
translation.zh:
‎有没有什么玛丽霍尔德法官的料
‎能跟我说说吗？

translation.en: Why?
I don't know. She called me to her chambers.
translation.zh: ‎我也不知道她传唤我去她的办公室

translation.en: -Did you do something? -No, I haven't done something.
translation.zh:
‎-你搞了什么案子？
‎-没有 我没接过案子

translation.en: Then why would she call you to chambers?
translation.zh: ‎那她为什么传唤你去办公室？

translation.en: I don't know, which is why I'm asking. What can you tell me about her?
translation.zh:
‎我不知道才问你的
‎你能告诉我你对她的了解吗？

translation.en: She's got a bug up her ass the size of the legal canon of ethics,
translation.zh: ‎她喜欢抓住点事情就大做文章

translation.en: which makes me think you've done something.
translation.zh: ‎因为这个我还以为你跟她有点问题

translation.en: -Thanks. -Wait, Mickey--
I'll see you tonight.
He's done something.
[Lorna] Oh, hello, Mick.
-Lorna. -I was driving this way anyway.
-No. You're checking up. -[Lorna] Says who?
translation.zh:
‎-才不是 你这是查岗
‎-谁说的？

translation.en: You look good. I have always loved this one.
translation.zh: ‎你看上去不错 我一直喜欢这套西服

translation.en: What are you doing here?
This could be a very big deal.
She's the presiding judge. So I came down to gather intel.
translation.zh: ‎她是审判长 所以我过来打探消息

translation.en: And?
Most of her work is administrative, which judge goes where and so forth.
translation.zh:
‎她大部分的工作是行政性的
‎哪个法官接受哪个案子什么的

translation.en: [Mickey] And?
And… she assigns cases.
-If that's what this is about… -You don't want me to blow it.
translation.zh:
‎-如果是因为这事…
‎-你希望我别搞砸了

translation.en: I'm just saying, whatever this is, it has to go well. Okay?
translation.zh:
‎我就是随便说说
‎无论是什么 必须搞定 好吗？

translation.en: [Holder] Mr. Haller, I presume.
Judge Holder.
I don't believe we've met before.
No, Your Honor.
Well, come on then.
The Lincoln Lawyer, that what they call you?
Some do, yes.
Or did.
Why?
Mainly worked out of my car. Going from court to court.
translation.zh:
‎我以前大部分时间都花在路上
‎一个庭接一个庭的出

translation.en: All the driving and so forth.
Being ready to flee the jurisdiction if need be.
translation.zh: ‎如果出了事可以随时逃脱追捕

translation.en: Never fled the jurisdiction.
translation.zh: ‎我从来没被司法系统的人追过

translation.en: Have a seat.
What's your relationship with Jerry Vincent?
translation.zh: ‎你跟杰瑞文森特关系怎么样？

translation.en: Jerry Vincent?
Uh, I used to go up against him back when he was a prosecutor.
translation.zh:
‎他还是检察官的时候
‎我跟他交锋过几次

translation.en: And he switched sides.
He was murdered last night.
Excuse me?
Shot dead in his car.
What?
If you were close, please accept my condolences,
translation.zh: ‎如果你们关系很好 请接受我的哀悼

translation.en: but that's not why you're here.
translation.zh: ‎但你来这里不是为了听我哀悼他

translation.en: Were you close?
I mean, friendly. Colleagues, mostly.
translation.zh: ‎大体上可以说是同事之间的友情吧

translation.en: He left you his practice.
I beg your pardon?
Mr. Vincent filed a motion with the court ten days ago
translation.zh:
‎十天前 文森特先生向法院
‎提交了一份动议

translation.en: that allowed for the transfer of his entire practice to you,
translation.zh: ‎准许他在无法履职或身故的情况下

translation.en: should he become incapacitated or deceased.
translation.zh: ‎把他的整个律师事务所留给你

translation.en: -He never discussed this with you? -No.
Well, last night he became deceased, which means what was his is now yours.
translation.zh:
‎他昨晚去世
‎所以他的案件现在就都是你的了

translation.en: Including the Trevor Elliott trial.
translation.zh: ‎包括特雷弗埃利奥特诉讼案

translation.en: You have heard of that?
The tech guy who killed his wife and her boyfriend.
Allegedly.
Of course.
That's now my case?
They're all your cases, Mr. Haller.
You might not get to keep them.
Every client has a right to move on to another attorney
translation.zh: ‎委托人获悉文森特先生的死讯后

translation.en: once apprised of Mr. Vincent's demise.
translation.zh: ‎都有权委托另外的代理律师

translation.en: What it does mean is you get first shot.
translation.zh: ‎这只意味着你是优先代理人

translation.en: Assuming I'm satisfied that Mr. Vincent's clients
are being transferred to a replacement counsel
translation.zh: ‎我认为文森特先生的委托人被转移给

translation.en: of good standing and competent skill.
translation.zh: ‎一位信誉良好且称职的替代律师

translation.en: As far as I can tell,
you haven't had any cases in quite some time.
translation.zh: ‎你已经很久都没代理过案件

translation.en: Yeah. [clears throat] I was in an accident about 18 months ago.
translation.zh: ‎对 我发生了事故 ‎差不多是一年半之前

translation.en: Surfing, if you can believe it.
translation.zh:
‎说出来不知您信不信
‎我是在冲浪时出的事儿

translation.en: I had multiple surgeries and, well, there were complications.
translation.zh: ‎动了好几次手术 还有并发症

translation.en: Complications?
I took painkillers. Got addicted to 'em. But that's over now. I got help.
translation.zh:
‎我止痛药上瘾了
‎但好在我得到了救治 一切都过去了

translation.en: Got clean. So whatever concerns you may have about my reputation, I--
translation.zh:
‎我已经脱瘾了
‎所以无论您对我的名声有什么顾虑…

translation.en: It's my reputation I'm concerned about. I'm the one that has to sign off on you.
translation.zh:
‎我顾虑的是我自己的名声
‎我一批准这些案子就是你的了

translation.en: Or not.
Why you?
Of all the lawyers out there.
Honestly, Your Honor, I have no idea.
translation.zh:
‎实话实说 法官大人
‎我自己都不知道

translation.en: Well, if you were to guess?
Well, as I said, Jerry and I were friendly,
translation.zh: ‎我跟您说过 杰瑞和我关系不错

translation.en: we trusted each other.
And second, though this is subjective,
translation.zh: ‎其次 虽然我这话有点主观

translation.en: when I am right, there's no better criminal defense attorney in Los Angeles
translation.zh:
‎如果我情况正常
‎洛杉矶没有比我更好的刑事辩护律师

translation.en: and Jerry knew that from personal experience.
translation.zh:
‎而杰瑞凭借自己的经验
‎也能了解这一点

translation.en: And you think you're right now?
I do.
This is an order
transferring Mr. Vincent's practice to you.
translation.zh: ‎文森特先生代理的案件移交给你

translation.en: I can rescind it just as fast.
translation.zh: ‎要撤销这个命令也能这么快

translation.en: I will be monitoring you, Mr. Haller.
translation.zh: ‎哈勒先生 我会观察你的表现

translation.en: I want an updated inventory of cases by the beginning of next week.
translation.zh:
‎我要求你下周开始时
‎提交最新案件清单

translation.en: After that, a bi-weekly status update
of every case on which you will remain counsel.
-Am I clear? -I won't let you down, Your Honor.
translation.zh:
‎-我说清楚了吗？
‎-法官大人 我不会辜负您

translation.en: Don't let your clients down.
I suggest you get to Mr. Vincent's office right now.
translation.zh: ‎我建议你立刻去文森特先生的办公室

translation.en: The police are, no doubt, searching it
and probably invading their privacy as we speak.
translation.zh:
‎警察肯定正在搜查
‎很有可能正在刺探委托人的隐私

translation.en: Thank you, Your Honor.
Good luck, Mr. Haller.
Well, did you get a case?
I just got a lot of them.
Including Trevor Elliott.
translation.zh: ‎特雷弗埃利奥特的案子归我了

translation.en: What?
I need to meet the clients,
get their sign-offs, but I might be back, Lorna.
translation.zh:
‎拿到他们的签字授权
‎但是我也许能卷土重来了 劳娜

translation.en: I might actually be back.
What did I tell you about positive visualization?
translation.zh: ‎我不是跟你说过积极的想象吗？

translation.en: You wake up, not a single client.
Now, you are repping a guy like Trevor Elliott in a murder trial.
translation.zh:
‎现在 你就代理上了
‎特雷弗埃利奥特这种人的谋杀案

translation.en: If he decides to keep me.
[Lorna] Positive thinking, Mickey. Positive thinking.
-Floor is closed, folks. -We have business on this floor.
translation.zh:
‎-你们两个 这层楼不开
‎-我们来有公事

translation.en: -Not today, you don't. -Talk to the judge.
translation.zh:
‎-今天不行
‎-那得法官同意才行

translation.en: Need to see some ID.
You know, you don't help yourselves being dicky-do's.
Just saying.
-Can I help you? -Mickey Haller. I'm an attorney.
translation.zh:
‎-有何贵干？
‎-我叫米奇哈勒 是个律师

translation.en: I've taken over Mr. Vincent's practice.
translation.zh:
‎文森特先生代理的案件
‎已经移交给我了

translation.en: You need to come back tomorrow. This is a crime scene. It's sealed off.
translation.zh:
‎你明天再来吧
‎这里是犯罪现场 闲人免进

translation.en: The crime scene was a parking garage, not this office.
translation.zh: ‎犯罪现场在停车场 不在这办公室里

translation.en: There are client files here I need to access and apparently safeguard.
translation.zh:
‎这里有委托人的文件
‎需要我接手 显然还需要妥善保护

translation.en: What'd you say your name was?
Mickey Haller. This is Lorna Crane. She works with me.
translation.zh:
‎米奇哈勒
‎这位是劳娜克雷恩 她是我同事

translation.en: Well, Mickey Haller and Lorna Crane,
I need you to both leave. Now.
-Dicky-do's, I'm telling you. -What was that?
translation.zh:
‎-招人烦 我就跟你说吧
‎-你说什么？

translation.en: That wasn't meant for you. But if you heard me, you heard me.
translation.zh: ‎我没说你 但是既然你听到了就算了

translation.en: You're contaminating a crime scene. You can't be here.
translation.zh:
‎你们正在破坏犯罪现场
‎不能留在这里

translation.en: This order will confirm I've been appointed
by the presiding judge of the Superior Court
translation.zh: ‎我已经被高等法院审判长指派为

translation.en: as replacement counsel to Jerry Vincent's clients.
translation.zh: ‎接手杰瑞文森特委托人的替代律师

translation.en: That means his cases are now my cases,
translation.zh: ‎就是说他的案件现在已经是我的案件

translation.en: and you have no right to be in here looking through files.
translation.zh: ‎而你们无权在这里查阅文件

translation.en: That's attorney-client privilege.
translation.zh: ‎这是律师与委托人的保密特权

translation.en: Mr. Vincent's been murdered. The motive could be in one of these files.
translation.zh:
‎文森特先生是谋杀案受害者
‎作案动机可能就在这些文件里

translation.en: -Even if that were the case-- -Counselor--
Just read the order, Detective.
translation.zh: ‎来读一下这份命令 探员

translation.en: Your crime scene is out in the garage
translation.zh: ‎您所说的犯罪现场在停车场

translation.en: and no judge in LA would extend it to this office and these files.
translation.zh:
‎而且洛杉矶没有法官会同意
‎犯罪现场包括这个办公室和文件

translation.en: You say this gives you all of Mr. Vincent's cases?
translation.zh:
‎您说这个命令
‎授权您接管文森特先生的全部案件？

translation.en: That's right.
-Then that puts you on our list. -Come again.
translation.zh:
‎-那您就上了我们的名单了
‎-什么意思？

translation.en: Our suspect list.
He's dead and you get the whole business?
That's motive, ask me.
Care to tell us where you were last night between 8:00 and midnight?
translation.zh:
‎您介意告诉我们
‎您昨晚8点到午夜在什么地方吗？

translation.en: You got me, Detective. You got me.
I killed Jerry. Case closed, everybody.
translation.zh: ‎是我杀了杰瑞 大家听好 案子破了

translation.en: Clearly you've done this before.
Are you gonna get out of here, or do I need to call the judge?
translation.zh:
‎你们是现在就走人
‎还是我必须给法官打个电话？

translation.en: Yeah.
-Guys. -Nice to meet you, too.
translation.zh:
‎-弟兄们
‎-认识你我也很开心啊

translation.en: -Bye. -[detective] Let's go.
Leave everything.
What?
All right. Come on.
[Lorna] Sometimes I think they teach it in the academy,
translation.zh: ‎有时候我觉得他们惹人生气

translation.en: how to piss people off.
When you think of all the bad blood between the people and police,
translation.zh: ‎一想到公众和警方之前的各种过节

translation.en: you'd think "how not to piss people off" would be in the curriculum.
translation.zh:
‎你会觉得“如何不让人生气”
‎应该作为课程内容的一部分

translation.en: How would you feel about me hiring Cisco?
translation.zh: ‎你看我请西斯科入伙怎么样？

translation.en: Mickey.
He's a good investigator. One of the best I've worked with.
translation.zh:
‎他是个不错的调查员
‎属于我共事过的最棒的几个人之一

translation.en: Working with your ex-wife is one thing,
translation.zh: ‎你跟前妻共事已经是新鲜事了

translation.en: hiring her boyfriend is pushing it, even for you.
translation.zh: ‎还要招她男朋友入伙就太过火了

translation.en: If Trevor Elliott decides to keep me,
translation.zh: ‎如果特雷弗埃利奥特决定保留我

translation.en: I'm gonna need to move fast
with an investigator I can trust, and Cisco--
Yeah, Mickey Haller.
Yes, sir. 2:00 p.m. As in 2:00 p.m. today?
translation.zh:
‎好的 先生 下午2点
‎你是说今天下午2点？

translation.en: Yes, sir, I'll be there. Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎好的 先生 我会过去 谢谢

translation.en: Who was that?
[sighs] It's Judge Canter's clerk. It seems Jerry has a trial today.
translation.zh:
‎是坎特尔法官的助手
‎杰瑞今天似乎有个庭审

translation.en: -What? -Yep.
-Are you gonna eat your sandwich? -No, Lorna, you can have it.
translation.zh:
‎-你三明治还吃吗？
‎-不了 劳娜 归你了

translation.en: Thank you. Run.
Hey.
-I'm covering for Jerry Vincent. -Oh, I heard.
translation.zh:
‎-我接替杰瑞文森特
‎-我听说了

translation.en: Sorry. What's the name?
Haller. Mickey Haller.
And your client's name?
Right.
It's, uh… Letts, first name Izzy.
I think it's a theft.
That would be Marc Daniels,
who I'm covering for, so that's actually mine.
translation.zh: ‎我在暂时顶着 所以其实是我的

translation.en: -Grand theft, by the by. -Obviously I'm gonna need a continuance.
translation.zh:
‎-顺便说一句 是严重窃盗罪
‎-很显然我需要延期

translation.en: Obviously I'm not gonna give it to you.
-What? -I got out-of-town witnesses.
I'd rather they be pissed off with the judge or you than me,
translation.zh:
‎我宁可是法官或者你出面
‎让他们白跑一趟 而不是我

translation.en: especially if I wanna get them back.
translation.zh: ‎特别是我还想让他们再次出庭的话

translation.en: [woman] LA-292587. People vs. Izzy Letts.
And we're on.
Sarah Shepard for the People, Judge. Ready for trial.
translation.zh:
‎法官大人 本人莎拉谢泼德
‎代表加利福尼亚人民参加庭审

translation.en: Mickey Haller for the defendant, Your Honor.
translation.zh: ‎法官大人 本人米奇哈勒代表被告方

translation.en: I'll be with you in one second. May I approach?
translation.zh:
‎我马上过来
‎我可以上前直接跟您说话吗？

translation.en: Your Honor, Mr. Vincent unexpectedly passed yesterday.
translation.zh: ‎法官大人 文森特先生昨晚意外去世

translation.en: I'm filing in.
My sincere condolences. When will you be ready?
translation.zh:
‎我致以诚挚哀悼
‎你什么时候可以准备好？

translation.en: -Well… -[Wallace] Don't be greedy.
It's a bench trial with two witnesses.
translation.zh: ‎本案是法官审判 有两位证人

translation.en: [Sarah] Out-of-town witnesses, who I'll lose with a continuance.
translation.zh: ‎而且来自外地 ‎如果延期 我会有失去证人的风险

translation.en: How's tomorrow?
Tomorrow?
Look at the file.
If you feel like you can't be ready, let me know.
translation.zh: ‎如果你觉得到没准备好就告诉我

translation.en: Step back.
This case is continued until tomorrow, 10:00 a.m.
translation.zh: ‎本案推迟至明天上午十时审理

translation.en: -Wait, what? -Sir?
Your Honor, we flew down here from San Francisco.
translation.zh: ‎法官大人 我们从旧金山飞到这里

translation.en: -This is not fair. -I'm afraid we have an emergency.
translation.zh:
‎-这不公平
‎-我恐怕得告诉您 事出紧急

translation.en: What about the victims? We had an emergency.
translation.zh:
‎受害人怎么办？
‎我们经历过了紧急时刻

translation.en: My wife was attacked, for God's sake.
She had her necklace violently snatched off her person.
translation.zh: ‎她的项链被粗暴地从她身上抢走

translation.en: [Wallace] And the court is sympathetic, but it's unavoidable.
translation.zh:
‎本庭对此表示同情
‎但这是不可避免的

translation.en: This case is pushed over until tomorrow at 10:00 a.m.
translation.zh: ‎本案推迟至明天上午十时审理

translation.en: Victims have no rights in this process.
translation.zh: ‎这种程序下受害人没有权利可言

translation.en: -Yeah. Excuse me. -That's what she stole?
At least your client has taste.
-Mickey Haller. I'm your attorney. -Where's Jerry?
translation.zh:
‎-我是米奇哈勒 你的律师
‎-杰瑞呢？

translation.en: Why don't we go someplace we can talk?
[Izzy] He was such a nice man.
He wasn't even charging me.
At least, not yet.
Why would somebody kill him?
I don't know. The police are still gathering evidence.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 警察还在收集证据

translation.en: What kind of world is this?
I got to be ready on your case by tomorrow.
translation.zh: ‎我得在明天之前准备好你的案子

translation.en: -So anything-- -I did not attack her.
I snatched the necklace and ran. I did not attack her.
translation.zh: ‎我扯下项链就跑了 没打她

translation.en: Okay. And is there a reason Jerry didn't try to plead this?
translation.zh:
‎好 杰瑞没有尝试按这个认罪
‎有什么原因吗？

translation.en: 'Cause they wanted two years. And Jerry said it was excessive.
translation.zh:
‎因为他们建议的刑期是两年
‎但是杰瑞说太重了

translation.en: He thought with a trial, I could at least impress the judge
translation.zh:
‎他觉得如果上庭的话
‎我至少可以用情有可原的状况

translation.en: with my extenuating circumstances.
Which are?
I'm a good person. Who had a drug problem.
translation.zh: ‎我是个好人 曾经有过毒瘾

translation.en: It wasn't me who stole that necklace,
so much as somebody I don't even recognize.
translation.zh: ‎而是我自己都不认识的那个人

translation.en: Somebody who's gone.
I went through rehab.
I'm in recovery.
I believe you.
But I don't know if that other person's ever really gone.
translation.zh:
‎但是我不知道
‎那个人是不是真的不存在了

translation.en: Mine was oxy.
You?
Same, basically.
Heroin.
Which I switched to when I couldn't afford the oxy anymore.
translation.zh: ‎我买不起奥施康定之后换的

translation.en: So, Jerry planned to put you up there?
translation.zh: ‎所以杰瑞的计划是安排你出庭？

translation.en: And introduce my good personhood status into evidence.
translation.zh: ‎还有把我良好的人格状态加入证据

translation.en: [Lorna] The trial is tomorrow, you say?
Bench trial, two witnesses. I think I'm good.
translation.zh:
‎法官审判 有两个证人
‎我觉得能搞定

translation.en: Mickey.
Call Marvin Beedleman, tell him I need a favor.
translation.zh:
‎给马尔文比德尔曼打个电话
‎告诉他我需要他帮个忙

translation.en: He's pushing 80, you might have to remind him he owes me.
translation.zh:
‎他快80了
‎你可能得提醒他欠我的人情

translation.en: Got anything on Trevor Elliott?
translation.zh: ‎特雷弗埃利奥特那边有消息吗？

translation.en: Jerry took a retainer of $625,000, most of which seems to be gone.
translation.zh:
‎杰瑞收了六十二万五千美元的定金
‎已经扣得没剩多少了

translation.en: He's due another 450 at trial. Non-refundable.
translation.zh: ‎出庭费四十五万 不可退的

translation.en: -Wow. -I know. It's like a year's worth of DUIs.
translation.zh: ‎我知道 这些钱够打一年酒驾毒驾的

translation.en: It's a franchise case.
-Who's the judge? -James P. Stanton.
He's an ex-defense attorney, so that's good. Are you almost there?
translation.zh:
‎他以前是辩护律师 是件好事
‎你快到了吗？

translation.en: -Your appointment's at 3:00. -I'm pulling up.
Do we know for sure Elliott hasn't already hired another lawyer?
translation.zh:
‎我们到底能不能确定
‎埃利奥特还没雇别的律师？

translation.en: Don't worry about any other lawyer. Just go.
translation.zh: ‎别担心别的律师了 全力投入吧

translation.en: All right.
Hey.
Your name?
Haller. Mickey Haller.
Nice car, man.
Thanks.
-Thank you. -[valet] I got it.
Mr. Haller.
Go right up. He's waiting for you.
Sure you don't need anything? Water…
translation.zh: ‎（夜曲传说） ‎您真的不喝点什么吗？水…

translation.en: I'm fine. Thank you.
Mr. Elliott's in his office?
His office? [chuckles] No.
[Mickey] Mr. Elliott.
Mickey Haller. How you doing?
Mr. Elliott?
[Trevor] I stand trial for murder next week.
translation.zh: ‎我因谋杀罪名下周就要出庭受审了

translation.en: My attorney's just been shot dead.
You can probably imagine how I might be doing.
translation.zh: ‎你可以想象一下我感觉多好

translation.en: Do they know anything? Any suspects?
translation.zh: ‎他们发现什么了吗？有嫌疑人了吗？

translation.en: Not to my knowledge, no.
I'm told they wanna interview all of his clients.
translation.zh:
‎警方告诉我
‎他们想询问他所有的客户

translation.en: Obviously, I wouldn't advise you talk to them
translation.zh: ‎我当然希望 其他事情解决之前

translation.en: while this other matter is pending.
What, are they gonna charge me with killing Jerry too?
translation.zh:
‎怎么？他们还要把我
‎当成杀了杰瑞的人起诉？

translation.en: Why not? It's open fucking season.
translation.zh:
‎为什么不呢？
‎什么狗屁事情都有可能

translation.en: So, who are you? How come I've never heard of you?
translation.zh: ‎你又是谁？我怎么从没听说过你？

translation.en: You've never heard of me
because I make it a practice not to be heard of.
Celebrity lawyers bring too much attention to their clients.
translation.zh: ‎明星律师们会让他们的客户过分曝光

translation.en: I don't operate that way.
Now as my case manager explained, Jerry transferred his practice to me.
translation.zh:
‎就像我的案件主理解释过的
‎杰瑞的案子移交给我了

translation.en: If you look at the contract of representation you signed with him,
translation.zh: ‎如果您看一下跟他签订的委托协议

translation.en: you'll see it allowed Jerry to discuss your case with me.
translation.zh: ‎您会发现杰瑞可以跟我讨论您的案子

translation.en: Did he? Discuss it with you?
No. The point I'm making, Jerry trusted me.
translation.zh: ‎没有 我要说明的是杰瑞信任我

translation.en: It doesn't mean I have to.
No, it does not.
-It's Mickey, is it? -That's right.
You play any basketball, Mickey?
-A little bit. -[Trevor] I don't.
Not really.
I love to watch though.
But it always drove me crazy
seeing great players struggle with free throws.
translation.zh: ‎罚球不进 总会让我发狂

translation.en: It's the one thing you can control. Every shot, exactly the same.
translation.zh:
‎这是你能控制的一件事
‎每一次罚球都一样

translation.en: Take your time, line it up.
And yet, time and chance happen to them all.
I don't mean to be an asshole.
Or maybe I do. We were set to go to trial next week.
translation.zh:
‎或者我其实就是
‎我们本来下周要开庭的

translation.en: I've been waiting five months to clear my name.
translation.zh:
‎为了恢复我的名声
‎我已经等了五个月

translation.en: -I understand. -Do you?
You understand what it's like for an innocent man
to have to wait and wait to have his day in court?
translation.zh:
‎数着日子等待出庭的那一天
‎是什么心情？

translation.en: To have to read all the lies and the bullshit in the media,
translation.zh: ‎还有媒体上长篇累牍的谎言和废话

translation.en: to have to wear a fucking ankle bracelet 24/7.
translation.zh: ‎还得每时每刻都他妈带着脚环

translation.en: -You understand all of that? -I've dealt with clients wrongly accused.
translation.zh:
‎-这些你都理解？
‎-我代理过遭受不实指控的客户

translation.en: Do not handle me.
Okay. I'll get right to the punchline then.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 那我有话就直说了

translation.en: Jerry Vincent was an excellent attorney.
translation.zh: ‎杰瑞文森特是个出色的律师

translation.en: -I'm better. -So you say.
translation.zh:
‎-我比他还出色
‎-你自己说的吧

translation.en: -So would say Jerry. -Maybe. If he were here, which he is not.
translation.zh:
‎-换了杰瑞也会这么说
‎-也许吧 死无对证

translation.en: -I get your frustration. -I asked you not to handle me.
translation.zh:
‎-我理解你的困惑
‎-我跟你说了不要刻意讨好我

translation.en: Before I consider you, I need to know you'd be ready next week,
translation.zh:
‎在我考虑雇你之前
‎得知道你为下周准备好没有

translation.en: 'cause I am not pushing this.
Not for another week. Not for another fucking day.
translation.zh: ‎一周都不行 一天都他妈的不行

translation.en: -I could be ready. -You're up to speed on the case?
translation.zh:
‎-我可以准备好
‎-这案子你都了解了？

translation.en: I will be. If I'm not prepared, I'll tell you.
translation.zh: ‎我会的 如果没准备好我会告诉你的

translation.en: But I'm confident you won't have to delay the trial.
translation.zh: ‎但是我有信心带你到时候出庭

translation.en: You're confident you have to tell me that to get the job.
translation.zh: ‎你得告诉我有信心才能接到这个案子

translation.en: All right.
I need to think about this.
That's a good idea. Have me checked out.
Take your time. Not too much.
translation.zh: ‎慢慢来 但是别花太多时间

translation.en: The longer you wait,
the greater the chance the judge will push your trial back.
translation.zh: ‎法官推迟开庭的可能性就越大

translation.en: If you go with me, I'll make sure that won't happen.
translation.zh:
‎如果我接了你的案子
‎可以确保不会推迟

translation.en: Your sales skills are admirable, I'll give you that.
translation.zh: ‎我承认你的销售技巧很高超

translation.en: Criminal defense is what I do, Mr. Elliott.
translation.zh: ‎埃利奥特先生 我是个做刑事辩护的

translation.en: I do it very well. You have my numbers.
translation.zh: ‎业绩还不错 你有我的电话号码

translation.en: I've lost everything, you understand that, Mickey?
translation.zh: ‎米奇 你明白吗？我失去了一切

translation.en: My life, my reputation…
worst of all, my wife.
Who I very much did love.
I get it.
You get nothing. Not yet.
You think you just hit the lottery, but I'm telling you… not yet.
translation.zh:
‎你就是觉得自己中了彩票
‎但是我跟你说…你还没有

translation.en: [Lorna over phone] Next week? That is impossible.
[Mickey] It was a deal-breaker.
First, let's land him,
then maybe I can talk him into a continuance.
That has to go.
-What? -Nothing.
translation.zh:
‎（当初我嘴巴严一点
‎就不会在这里了） ‎-什么？
‎-没事

translation.en: I'm gonna need a driver.
I need this time to be going over files.
I was thinking maybe Quintero. Is he around?
translation.zh: ‎我考虑也许昆特罗可以 他有空吗？

translation.en: Still doing time in Corcoran, I heard.
translation.zh: ‎我听说他还在科克兰蹲着呢

translation.en: Well, what about Stevie?
Stevie is a terrible driver. Nobody's getting in the car with him.
translation.zh:
‎斯蒂维车开得烂极了
‎没人愿意坐他的车

translation.en: All right. Put the word out, will ya?
translation.zh: ‎好吧 你帮我到处问问好吗？

translation.en: I'm pulling in. See you in a second.
translation.zh: ‎我这就停车了 一会儿见

translation.en: Jesus. You scared the shit out of me, Cisco.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 西斯科 你差点把我吓死了

translation.en: What the hell are you even doing here, man?
translation.zh: ‎老兄 你有什么大事儿来这里？

translation.en: Lorna said you wanted to hire me.
Not for this, Cisco. To work on the Trevor Elliott case.
translation.zh:
‎不是这个案子 西斯科
‎我找你是因为特雷弗埃利奥特的案子

translation.en: The police'll handle who killed Jerry Vincent.
translation.zh: ‎警方会负责杰瑞文森特的命案

translation.en: You're giving me a heart attack, man.
translation.zh: ‎老兄 你弄得我心脏病都快犯了

translation.en: You could have given me one.
translation.zh: ‎你也差点弄得我心脏病发作

translation.en: Sorry.
So, Trevor Elliott, huh? That's a big get.
translation.zh: ‎特雷弗埃利奥特 一条大鱼

translation.en: Yeah, if I get him.
I haven't nailed down the gig.
I need to be able to tell him something good.
Something to make him wanna hire me.
Have you seen the file?
Some. Two dead people. He was at the scene. Not exactly stellar.
translation.zh:
‎一部分 两条人命
‎他在现场 不是件容易的案子

translation.en: Yeah, well, I gotta offer "stellar" somehow.
translation.zh:
‎是啊 我得想办法
‎让这案子“容易”一点儿

translation.en: Maybe Maggie can give us some inside baseball on the State's case.
translation.zh: ‎也许玛姬可以给我们点技术上的细节

translation.en: Oh, shit. Maggie.
[Maggie] Damn it.
You can go, Mom. I'll be fine till he gets here.
translation.zh:
‎妈妈 你可以走了
‎他来之前我应该没什么问题

translation.en: I'm not going.
Think I'm okay to be by myself for a half-hour.
translation.zh: ‎我自己待半个小时天不会塌

translation.en: The world hasn't gotten that dangerous.
-Not happening. -I'm hoping to have a nice time tonight.
translation.zh:
‎-我不会走的
‎-我盼着今晚能好好过

translation.en: My chances are better if Dad's in a good mood,
translation.zh: ‎如果爸爸情绪不错的话会更有可能

translation.en: and the chances of that are better
if you don't rip him a new one for being 15 minutes late.
translation.zh:
‎你会不会
‎因为他迟到15分钟而大发雷霆

translation.en: There he is.
-[Mickey] I'm sorry. -[Maggie] Really?
Hi, Dad.
Sorry.
Sorry, Mags.
-You look good. Sorry. -You gave me your word. 6:00 p.m.
translation.zh:
‎-你看起棒极了 对不起
‎-你答应了6点过来的

translation.en: [Mickey] I know.
You really wanna get back to joint custody? Step one--
translation.zh: ‎你真的想恢复共同抚养权？首先…

translation.en: Maggie, I'm here now.
How about we deal with you and me later, all right?
translation.zh: ‎咱俩之间的事情以后再说好吗？

translation.en: -[Maggie] I'll pick you up in the morning. -Okay.
-I love you. -Love you, too.
Hey.
If you're gonna treat me like shit,
translation.zh: ‎你真要把我当狗屎一样对待

translation.en: have the decency to not look so amazing while doing it.
translation.zh: ‎至少行行好 不要打扮得这么漂亮

translation.en: [Hayley] Hello.
-How are you, baby? You good? -I'm good.
-Ready? Have your bag? -Yeah.
[Cisco] He had a sense what was coming, Jerry.
I don't know.
Well, he files a motion ten days ago.
Transfer his practice in case of his death.
Look, let's just focus on Elliott for now, okay?
translation.zh: ‎现在咱们专注在埃利奥特身上好吗？

translation.en: Mickey's not really serious about trying this case next week, is he?
translation.zh:
‎下周开庭这事儿
‎米奇没那么认真 对吧？

translation.en: Technically, it's nine days. Okay, I said the same thing,
translation.zh:
‎严格地说 还有九天
‎好吧 这话我以前说过

translation.en: but cases like this don't come around often.
And Mickey needs this. He needs something.
translation.zh:
‎而且米奇需要这案子
‎他得有点事情做

translation.en: He's okay with… You know?
-I take it you haven't told him. -I just haven't found the right moment.
translation.zh:
‎-我觉得你还没跟他说
‎-我只是还没找到合适的机会

translation.en: [Hayley] So, you didn't actually go in the water?
No.
You know that nightmare I have?
It's not so much of me almost drowning,
it's of you.
Leaving you behind, that's the part that always gets me.
translation.zh: ‎留下你撒手而去才让我痛苦

translation.en: -Dad… -What?
You had an accident.
You're not the first surfer it's happened to
translation.zh: ‎你不是第一个冲浪出事儿的人

translation.en: and I'm not the first kid to have something bad happen to a parent.
translation.zh: ‎我也不是第一个父母遭遇不幸的孩子

translation.en: You are tough. You are tough.
[in English] Don't get quite as tough as her, okay?
translation.zh: ‎但别变得像你妈妈那么坚强 好吗？

translation.en: -[chuckles] I'll try not to. -Well, good.
She's worried about you.
She said that?
She thinks it might be some mid-life thing on top of the pills.
translation.zh:
‎她觉得不光是药物
‎还有人到中年的问题

translation.en: Is it?
Well, maybe a little.
What do you mean?
Mija, two failed marriages, busted law practice,
translation.zh:
‎闺女 两段失败的婚姻
‎中断了的法律生涯

translation.en: six months in rehab…
You hit the jackpot with your daughter. Come on…
translation.zh: ‎你女儿呢 就是彩票头奖 拜托…

translation.en: Hey. [chuckles]
When I look back, I always wanted to be a defense lawyer,
translation.zh:
‎我回首过去时
‎从我还是个孩子 看着我爸爸工作时

translation.en: ever since I was a kid watching my dad.
translation.zh: ‎自己就一直想做个辩护律师

translation.en: The stuff they teach you in law school, how the system's supposed to work.
translation.zh: ‎法学院里教的是司法系统如何运转

translation.en: You get out there and it's all just muddy.
translation.zh: ‎你入行才会发现一切都是模糊的

translation.en: Everybody's working an angle.
Everybody lies.
After a while you wonder if you're doing any good at all.
translation.zh:
‎过不了多久 你就会开始怀疑
‎自己从事的是不是正当的事业

translation.en: You know Mom never feels that way, right? She just puts bad people away.
translation.zh:
‎你知道妈妈从来不会那么想 对吗？
‎她不接坏人的案子

translation.en: Your mom's a true believer.
That's what makes her so great at what she does.
But you're not?
I was. I think I still am.
translation.zh: ‎过去是 我想现在也是吧

translation.en: Look, I believe that in our system, everyone is innocent until proven guilty.
translation.zh:
‎我相信 在我们的系统里
‎被证明有罪之前 每个人都是无辜的

translation.en: Now, when the State points the finger at you,
well, I'm all you got.
Now what?
Are you kidding me?
Sorry to intrude.
This better be good, Detective.
It's important.
We really gotta see Jerry Vincent's files.
translation.zh: ‎我们真的得看看杰瑞文森特的文件

translation.en: I realize you have attorney-client privilege.
translation.zh: ‎我明白你受律师代理人特权保护

translation.en: DA says you probably have the right to shut us down.
translation.zh:
‎地区检察官说你很有可能
‎给我们吃闭门羹

translation.en: Seriously? I knew this guy.
I really need you to see what we're up against.
translation.zh:
‎我真的需要你帮忙
‎好清楚我们要对付的是什么人

translation.en: It's a kill shot to the head, very clean.
Whoever pulled the trigger picked up the shell casings too.
Someone targeted Jerry Vincent
and they didn't take his wallet or his cash.
They took his bag with his laptop.
translation.zh: ‎但是拿走了包和笔记本电脑

translation.en: Now, the question is, what was on there? What did he know that got him killed?
translation.zh:
‎现在的问题是 里面到底有什么？
‎他究竟知道了什么才引来杀身之祸？

translation.en: If the answer's any place, it's probably in his files.
translation.zh:
‎如果有答案
‎那很有可能在他的文件里

translation.en: I wish I could help you, Detective, I really do.
translation.zh: ‎我是真的希望可以帮你 探员

translation.en: I'm asking you to help yourself.
You're at risk, Counselor.
You could be next.
[Cisco] Was Jerry involved with wise guys or cartel guys?
translation.zh: ‎杰瑞跟黑帮或者毒枭有联系吗？

translation.en: I doubt it, he was straight ahead.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得没有 他是个直脾气

translation.en: -Ex-prosecutor. -Maybe it's someone he put in prison.
translation.zh:
‎-前检察官
‎-也许是他以前送进监狱的人

translation.en: One second.
Yeah, I thought about that. Comb through the files.
translation.zh:
‎对 我想过这种可能
‎仔细查看一下文件

translation.en: Look for any hint of threats, clients, ex-clients, everybody, all right?
translation.zh:
‎看看有没有任何威胁的痕迹 委托人
‎以前的委托人、任何人 明白吗？

translation.en: I'm on it.
In the meantime, Elliott gave us access
translation.zh: ‎还有 埃利奥特允许我们

translation.en: to his house in Malibu where the murders happened.
translation.zh:
‎勘测他在马里布的房子
‎命案是在那里发生的

translation.en: It's important we get a true picture.
I'll shoot you the address. Let's meet there around noon.
translation.zh: ‎我会把地址发给你 中午在那里碰面

translation.en: This means we have the case?
Not yet. The more we learn the better our chances.
translation.zh:
‎还没有
‎我们了解的越多 胜算就越大

translation.en: -Where are you right now? -Heading into trial.
Marvin.
-Oh! Mickey! -Thanks for coming. I appreciate this.
translation.zh:
‎-米奇！
‎-谢谢你过来 我很感激

translation.en: Why wouldn't I?
When the greatest person I ever met asks for my help,
translation.zh: ‎我认识的最伟大的人要我帮忙

translation.en: I give my help.
How's Eleanor?
Oh, she's absolutely fantastic is how she is. And she sends her love.
translation.zh: ‎她好得不得了 还有她要我向你致敬

translation.en: Send my love to her. Thank you. [woman] LA-292587. People vs. Izzy Letts.
translation.zh:
‎-请向她转达我的敬意 谢谢你
‎-LA-292587诉伊基莱茨案

translation.en: Be with you in a second.
Mickey Haller, Judge, asks that we approach?
translation.zh:
‎法官大人 我是米奇哈勒
‎可否上前与您讨论？

translation.en: Please tell me you're ready.
-Almost, Judge. -[Wallace] Mr. Haller.
translation.zh:
‎-差不多了 法官大人
‎-哈勒先生

translation.en: Actually, Judge.
At the risk of further antagonizing Mr. Holt,
translation.zh: ‎尽管有进一步激怒霍尔特先生的风险

translation.en: maybe we call him up for the sidebar?
-Excuse me? -What's going on?
A bit unorthodox, but in the best interests
of judicial economy and justice.
translation.zh: ‎却符合司法成本和正义的最佳利益

translation.en: Take 30 seconds.
Mr. Holt.
Could you approach the bench?
How you doin'? All right, I'll make this quick.
My client is charged with grand theft.
translation.zh: ‎我的委托人被诉严重窃盗罪

translation.en: Which under Section 487 of the Penal Code
means the value of the stolen object exceeds $950.
translation.zh: ‎被盗物品价值应该超过950美元

translation.en: Your Honor, that necklace is worth what, $400, tops?
translation.zh:
‎法官大人
‎那条项链最多也就值400美元吧？

translation.en: What?
I've taken few payments in diamonds and gold,
translation.zh:
‎我有几次的代理费
‎是用钻石和黄金支付的

translation.en: developed a pretty good eye.
But to be sure, Judge,
translation.zh: ‎但是出于稳妥 法官大人

translation.en: I also brought with me an expert on the matter.
translation.zh: ‎我还请来了一位这方面的专家

translation.en: That is Marvin Beedleman. He's a jeweler.
translation.zh:
‎那位先生名叫马尔文比德尔曼
‎是位珠宝商

translation.en: He can give us a pretty quick appraisal.
translation.zh: ‎他可以为我们做个快速估价

translation.en: The District Attorney might want to get one of her own.
translation.zh: ‎地区检察官也可以另请高明

translation.en: Guessing your wife doesn't know it's a knock-off?
translation.zh: ‎我猜你太太不知道这件是假货？

translation.en: I, of course, don't want to upset her.
Are you kidding me?
I am not. I am not.
Even if it is a knock-off, the defendant thought she was stealing the real thing.
translation.zh:
‎即使这是件假货
‎被告在作案时以为这是真货

translation.en: You have a witness to testify as to her state of mind?
translation.zh:
‎你有证人
‎能证明她当时的精神状况吗？

translation.en: Did you not have the necklace appraised?
We have the appraisal from his insurance company.
Might open up a whole new can of fraud.
translation.zh: ‎也许要查查有没有欺诈行为了

translation.en: I could be wrong, of course.
Miss Shepard, any thoughts on how you might like to play this?
translation.zh:
‎谢泼德小姐
‎你对诉讼如何进行有何见解？

translation.en: Completely dismissed? I get to just go?
Well, unless the DA decides to prosecute the Holts
translation.zh: ‎除非地区检察官决定起诉霍尔特夫妇

translation.en: and you get called as a witness against them,
but I don't think that'll happen.
Oh, my God.
Didn't even have to get up there
and testify as to what a nice person you are.
[chuckles] I don't know how to thank you. I will pay you one day, I promise.
translation.zh:
‎我不知道该怎么感谢你
‎我答应你总有一天我会付钱给你

translation.en: You pay me now.
I'm broke. I don't have a nickel to my name.
translation.zh: ‎我破产了 名下一分钱都没有

translation.en: Have a driver's license?
Excuse me?
[Lorna] What do you mean you hired her?
I told you I needed a driver, and she can drive.
translation.zh:
‎我跟你说我需要一位司机
‎正好她会开车

translation.en: I'm actually a good driver.
She's actually a good driver, Lorna.
translation.zh: ‎劳娜 其实她车开得很好

translation.en: [Lorna] It wouldn't kill you to work from an office.
translation.zh: ‎你在办公室工作死不了人 ‎太多条条框框

translation.en: Too much structure. I gotta work while I'm on the move.
translation.zh: ‎太多条条框框 ‎我必须得一边跑路一边工作

translation.en: -Didn't you say she's an addict? -Former. Who am I to judge? Turn right.
translation.zh:
‎-你不是说过她有毒瘾吗？
‎-以前有 我没资格评判别人 右转

translation.en: I'm almost there. Call you back.
translation.zh: ‎我快到了 一会儿打给你

translation.en: Mickey, no-- [groans]
-Maggie. -Hi, Lorna. Nice to see you.
translation.zh:
‎-玛姬
‎-嗨 劳娜 见到你真高兴

translation.en: Um, thank you, and likewise. You look pretty.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 我也是 你这身真漂亮

translation.en: Something I can help you with?
We both care for him, Lorna.
translation.zh: ‎劳娜 我们两个都关心他

translation.en: And I mean, I'm happy
for all this positive turn of events for Mickey…
But?
But taking over a high-profile murder for a lawyer who was just gunned down
translation.zh:
‎但是从一个死于枪击的律师手上
‎接这么一件高规格的谋杀案

translation.en: for God knows what reason, do we really think this is a good idea?
translation.zh:
‎而且律师的死因不明
‎我们真的觉得这是个好主意？

translation.en: The wolf is at the door, Maggie.
translation.zh: ‎玛姬 我们面临着很多财务问题

translation.en: I have been holding his practice together with string and glue.
translation.zh:
‎我费尽全力
‎才让他的业务磕磕绊绊往前走

translation.en: His life is bigger than just his law career.
translation.zh: ‎他的命比他的律师职业重要

translation.en: He needs to get back on his feet first. His daughter needs him back on his feet.
translation.zh:
‎他需要先恢复好
‎他女儿需要他恢复好

translation.en: I know, and this could be the thing that gets him there.
translation.zh: ‎我明白 但这件案子会让他恢复元气

translation.en: For the first time in a year, he's alive again.
translation.zh: ‎一年来这是他第一次像个活人

translation.en: And you know Mickey.
The only thing he likes more than a fight
is a fight with one hand tied behind his back.
[Mickey] I'll be about 15 minutes.
[Izzy] Sounds good.
Welcome to the jungle.
Remind me. We're never bringing the jury here.
translation.zh:
‎记得提醒我
‎我们绝不能让陪审团来这里

translation.en: They'll hate this guy and we're doomed.
translation.zh: ‎他们会痛恨这个人 我们就输定了

translation.en: [Cisco] Wife was there on the bed.
Boyfriend there on the floor.
Police think Elliott stood at the door. Maybe watching them fuck--
translation.zh:
‎警察认为埃利奥特站在门口
‎也许看着他们操…

translation.en: Fornicate for a while before he came in and shot 'em.
translation.zh: ‎通奸了好一阵子 然后才进来开的枪

translation.en: [Mickey] Murder weapon was never found.
Probably out there in the ocean.
I don't know, Mick. You're good, but this good?
translation.zh:
‎我说不准 米克
‎你水平很高 但是这案子有胜算吗？

translation.en: If they could place Elliott here.
translation.zh:
‎如果他们能证明
‎埃利奥特事发时在这里

translation.en: Motive all over. Positive gunshot residue.
translation.zh: ‎动机充分 枪击证据明显

translation.en: Has he given you his story?
Hey, listen, there's something else.
What?
I know you're okay with me seeing Lorna and shit.
translation.zh: ‎我知道你不介意我跟劳娜约会

translation.en: At least you say you're okay with it.
Lorna's been meaning to tell you when the time is right,
translation.zh:
‎劳娜一直说
‎她要等到时机合适再跟你说

translation.en: but somehow,
I suspect the time might never be right for her,
translation.zh: ‎我猜她觉得合适的时机永远不会到来

translation.en: so I'm just gonna say it.
Me and Lorna,
we're gonna get married.
Ah.
What do you mean, "Ah"? What is "Ah"? Is it okay with you?
translation.zh:
‎你“啊”这一声是什么意思？
‎你觉得这事儿可以吗？

translation.en: I'm not part of the equation, Cisco.
translation.zh: ‎不关我的事儿啊 西斯科

translation.en: But I wanna know, is it okay with you?
translation.zh: ‎但是我想知道 你觉得可以吗？

translation.en: Do you love her?
With all my heart.
Then it's all right with me.
But I'll tell you, Cisco.
translation.zh: ‎但是我得告诉你 西斯科

translation.en: She's one of the four most important people in my life.
translation.zh: ‎她是我这辈子最重要的四个人之一

translation.en: -Should you ever hurt her-- -Of course I would never.
translation.zh:
‎-要是你有一天伤害了她…
‎-我绝对永远都不会

translation.en: She's the greatest thing ever.
Who's the fourth?
What?
You said four people.
Hayley, Maggie, Lorna and--
Who's the fourth?
Mickey Haller.
Yes, uh… Yes, I'll be there.
Trevor Elliott has summoned me.
[Trevor] You checked out well.
High-performing trial lawyer, much better than Jerry according to most.
translation.zh:
‎上庭记录出色
‎大多数人都说你比杰瑞还出色

translation.en: Until you went off the deep end and became a drug addict.
translation.zh: ‎直到你行为怪异 还染上了毒瘾

translation.en: I'm not an addict now.
Listen, Mickey. The thing about this case,
translation.zh: ‎米奇 这件案子的关键在于

translation.en: I need to win it in court
translation.zh: ‎我必须在法庭审理上赢这场官司

translation.en: and I need to win in the court of public opinion.
translation.zh: ‎而且我需要在公众舆论方面也赢

translation.en: The world is quick to cancel these days.
translation.zh: ‎这年头 世上的人说指控谁就指控谁

translation.en: Just take a look at my Twitter feed.
I need a lawyer who can get me my freedom back
translation.zh: ‎我需要的律师要能赢回我的自由

translation.en: and my name back.
Are you that lawyer?
No.
No, all I can do is get you a "Not guilty."
translation.zh: ‎我所能做的只是给你赢得无罪判决

translation.en: I can't deliver you a finding of innocent.
translation.zh: ‎我没法给你赢得无辜的结论

translation.en: The courts don't work that way. Not guilty, best I can do.
translation.zh:
‎法庭有法庭的工作方式
‎最好的结果只会是无罪

translation.en: And you can get that? For sure?
Depends on what I have to work with.
-I didn't kill them. -I didn't ask you.
translation.zh:
‎-他们不是我杀的
‎-我没问这个

translation.en: But I need you to know, I didn't.
translation.zh: ‎但是我需要你知道 我没杀人

translation.en: All right, here's the deal, Trevor.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 特雷弗 咱们这么说吧

translation.en: I can win almost any case as long as I know what I'm dealing with.
translation.zh:
‎只要我知道拿什么进行辩论
‎几乎所有案件我都能赢下来

translation.en: Right now, I don't.
So you lie to me,
I don't want your case, however much I might need it.
translation.zh: ‎不管我多需要 我都不接你的案子

translation.en: Okay.
Okay.
I was as far from cool as you can get in high school.
translation.zh: ‎我在高中时一点都不招人喜欢

translation.en: Girls wouldn't give me the time of day, but I could always talk to Zelda.
translation.zh:
‎女生们不理我
‎好在我一直都可以跟塞尔达聊天

translation.en: Real life sucked.
But video games, they mattered.
Then I met Lara.
She was different. She was beautiful, she was brilliant.
translation.zh: ‎她与众不同 既漂亮又聪明

translation.en: And she loved me.
We're just out of grad school, the game industry was exploding.
translation.zh:
‎我们研究生毕业时
‎赶上游戏产业大爆发

translation.en: But the problem that nobody could get around was the uncanny valley.
translation.zh: ‎但是没有人能解决恐怖谷这个问题

translation.en: Uncanny what?
If you're trying to make something humanlike,
translation.zh: ‎如果你把一件东西做得很像真人

translation.en: the human brain will reject it unless it's almost perfect.
translation.zh:
‎除非几乎是近乎完美的模拟
‎否则人类大脑会自发地抗拒它

translation.en: You know, video game characters were close to real,
translation.zh: ‎电子游戏的角色都很像真人

translation.en: but not close enough.
Especially in the eyes, the eyes always gave it away.
translation.zh: ‎特别是眼睛 总是功亏一篑

translation.en: But the closer the characters resemble us,
the more connection we feel, the more we wanna play.
translation.zh:
‎我们觉得联系越紧密
‎就会玩更长时间

translation.en: That's the uncanny valley. And I was the one who crossed it.
translation.zh: ‎这就是恐怖谷 而我成功地跨越了它

translation.en: Working out of my garage.
translation.zh: ‎我的工作是在我的车库里完成的

translation.en: One script, maybe 100 lines of code,
translation.zh: ‎一个脚本 差不多一百行代码

translation.en: changed everything.
The girl in the game.
Nocturna.
That was our first big hit.
translation.zh: ‎那是我们的第一款热卖作品

translation.en: It's what put us on the map.
And, yes, I modeled the character after Lara.
translation.zh:
‎当然 我这个角色
‎是按照拉拉的样子建模的

translation.en: It's fair to say that her DNA
is in everything this company has ever done.
translation.zh:
‎这家公司所做的一切
‎都暗藏了她的DNA

translation.en: We were a team.
I didn't know she was cheating on me.
translation.zh: ‎但是我那时不知道她背叛了我

translation.en: Looking back at it, I was working all the time,
translation.zh: ‎现在回头看 我没日没夜地工作

translation.en: I was traveling too much, and she grew resentful.
translation.zh: ‎一直在到处出差 所以她心生怨恨

translation.en: Angry.
I went out to the house that day to surprise her.
translation.zh: ‎那天我去那里是为了给她一个惊喜

translation.en: And instead…
I will never get that out of my head as long as I live.
translation.zh:
‎我永远都没法把那一幕
‎从我脑海里抹去

translation.en: I found her like that. My own wife. My best friend.
translation.zh:
‎我看见她死在那里
‎我的妻子 最好的朋友

translation.en: And that fucking yoga instructor.
And everyone thinks I killed her,
translation.zh: ‎而每个人都觉得是我杀了她

translation.en: but the truth is if I had found them alive,
translation.zh: ‎但真相是 即使我把她捉奸在床

translation.en: I wouldn't even have left her.
I would have begged her to come back to me because I need her.
translation.zh: ‎我会求她回到我身边 因为我需要她

translation.en: People say I'm a genius. The code I wrote, they call it magic.
translation.zh:
‎人们说我是个天才
‎说我写的代码有魔力

translation.en: Lara was the magic. She was the inspiration.
translation.zh:
‎有魔力的那个人是拉拉
‎是她激励了我

translation.en: Without her, I would still be sitting in my garage.
translation.zh: ‎没有她 我应该现在都还在住车库里

translation.en: I never could have killed her
because without her…
I have no magic.
That's what you're dealing with. Can you work with that?
translation.zh:
‎这就是你要处理的案子
‎你能搞定吗？

translation.en: I can win with that.
-You can win with that? -I can.
-You can win with that next week? -I can.
Then you're hired.
-[Lorna] Well? -We got it.
-We got the case? -Lots of work to do, Lorna.
translation.zh:
‎-案子归我们了？
‎-劳娜 要干的活儿很多

translation.en: -We need to keep our heads. -Oh, my God.
Lots of work. Tell Cisco to meet me at the office.
translation.zh: ‎活儿很多 让西斯科来办公室见我

translation.en: Mickey…
See you in a few.
You okay?
Your eyes look like they're about to cry.
Uh, just allergies.
Your eyes should be on the road, by the way.
translation.zh: ‎还有 你最好盯着前面的路

translation.en: You really okay?
Never been better. Take the turn up here, will you?
translation.zh: ‎好得不得了 前面转弯好吗？

translation.en: What? Is something wrong?
Yeah, we're being followed.
